description: gallery installation in the form of a room with pink and white walls and white floor; white cloth 'ceiling'; three shelves at back of room, each holding a bottle of 'Purge' detergent; 12 pairs of men's underwear and 12 pairs of women's underwear suspended from 4 clotheslines at ceiling and embroidered with blue and pink thread; 'Purificator 2000' washing machine at center of room; white bowl beneath washing machine; white plastic laundry basket holding additional undergarments to the right of washing machine
medium: wood, paint, fabric, linoleum, cotton, plastic, ceramic, washing machine
title: Purificatorium 2000
